Docs.summary: Provides classes to manage a variety of visual elements that are intended for display only, such as bitmaps and gradients.

remarks.para: Provides classes to manage a variety of visual elements that are intended for display only, such as bitmaps and gradients. These elements are often used by widgets as background images or simply as indicators (for example, a volume level indicator).
You can create most of these drawables using XML, as described in Drawable Resources.
